name: WR703N Shairport
short_description:
This is a simply a barebones OpenWRT image designed to turn a WR703N into an airplay streamer using shairport and a cheap USB sound card.

Installation Instructions:
1) Flash firmware using appropriate image/method.

2) Telnet to the administrative LAN interface @ 192.168.1.1 (no password). Set a password (passwd).

3) Update /lib/wifi/mac80211.sh with your wireless settings.

4) Update /etc/rc.local - set "--apname" to your choosing. This name will appear in your iDevice.

5) Reboot

If you want to build it yourself, I've included the instructions I followed in the wiki.
